motions.title: Move Dunwoody Nature Center Item to Consent Agenda
motions.description: Motion to move item #15 (Dunwoody Nature Center Matching Funding Agreement Extension) to the consent agenda.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of November 25, 2024 meeting minutes, stormwater repairs funding, athletic agreements, ESRI renewal, police applications migration, and Dunwoody Nature Center agreement extension.

motions.title: Discover Dunwoody 2025 Budget Approval
motions.description: Approval of the Discover Dunwoody 2025 proposed budget.

motions.title: Contract Amendment for Peeler Road Path Design
motions.description: Approval of contract amendment with Practical Design Partners for the Peeler Road path design.

motions.title: Capital Project Closeout and Funding Reallocation
motions.description: Approval of capital project closeout and reallocation of funding.

motions.title: Text Amendment to Chapter 6 (Second Read)
motions.description: Second read approval of text amendment to Chapter 6 to restrict unlicensed sale of dogs, cats, or domestic rabbits.

motions.title: City of Civility Resolution
motions.description: Approval of City of Civility resolution.

motions.title: 2025 Athletic Agreements for Senior Baseball and Softball
motions.description: Approval of 2025 Athletic Agreements for Dunwoody Senior Baseball and Dunwoody High School Softball Booster Club.
